languages.text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.
languages.original_text: Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%.

traits.locale_text:
The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of voice of command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and the damage from this attack can't be reduced below <u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance.
If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of voice of command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and the damage from this attack can't be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

languages.text: Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch diesen Angriff kann zudem unter keinen Umständen auf unter {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % reduziert werden.
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv.
Wenn das Ziel unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, und der Schaden von diesem Angriff kann unter keinen Umständen auf unter {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % reduziert werden.

Der nächste Angriff des Ziels ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} und ist auf doppelte Entfernung effektiv.
Wenn das Ziel unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} von Stimme des Kommandos steht, ignoriert dieser Angriff das feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, und der Schaden von diesem Angriff kann unter keinen Umständen auf unter <u>(30 + 3× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % reduziert werden.

languages.text: L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance efficace est doublée. Si la cible est sous l'effet de la capacité Voix du commandement, cette attaque ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi. De plus, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de cette attaque ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance effective est doublée.
Si la cible est sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la capacité Voix du Commandement, cette attaque ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi et les dégâts de celle-ci ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

L'attaque suivante de la cible ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} et sa distance effective est doublée.
Si la cible est sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la capacité Voix du Commandement, cette attaque ignore l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi et les dégâts de celle-ci ne peuvent pas être inférieurs à <u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g})</u> % pour quelque raison que ce soit.

languages.text: El siguiente ataque del objetivo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y tiene el doble de distancia eficaz. Si el objetivo está bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del enemigo y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} no podrá reducirse por debajo del {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % por ningún motivo.
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
El siguiente ataque del objetivo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y tiene el doble de distancia eficaz.
Si el objetivo está bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de Voz de mando, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del enemigo y el daño no podrá reducirse por debajo del {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} % por ningún motivo.

El siguiente ataque del objetivo ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} y tiene el doble de distancia eficaz.
Si el objetivo está bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de Voz de mando, este ataque ignorará la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del enemigo y el daño no podrá reducirse por debajo del <u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g})</u> % por ningún motivo.

languages.text: 目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。 如果目标处于指挥之声效果下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，且此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会由于任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。
如果目标处于指挥之声{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，且此次攻击的伤害不会因为任何效果降低至{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%以下。

目标的下次攻击会忽略{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}，且有效射程翻倍。
如果目标处于指挥之声{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}下，则此次攻击还会忽略敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，且此次攻击的伤害不会因为任何效果降低至<u>（30+3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}）</u>%以下。

languages.text: ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を無視し、この攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はどんな理由があっても{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%を下回ることはない。
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。
ターゲットが指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}を無視し、この攻撃によるダメージはどんな理由があっても{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%を下回ることはない。

ターゲットの次の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}を無視し、有効距離が2倍になる。
ターゲットが指揮の声の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の下にある場合、この攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を無視し、この攻撃によるダメージはどんな理由があっても<u>(30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％を下回ることはない。

languages.text: Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} противника, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%.

If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.

traits.locale_text: Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} противника, а урон никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже (30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})%.

Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} противника, а урон никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже (30 + 3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})%.

Следующая атака цели игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, а ее эффективная дальность увеличивается вдвое. Если на цель действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} Приказ командира, эта атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} противника, а урон никаким способом нельзя опустить ниже {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}%.

languages.text: Hedefin bir sonraki saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperi{/g} yok sayar ve saldırının etkili mesafesi iki katına çıkar. Hedef, Emir Sözü'nün etkisi altındaysa saldırı, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerini yok sayar. Ayrıca saldırının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, hiçbir sebeple %{uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d} değerinin altına düşemez.
languages.original_text: The target's next attack will ignore {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and will have double the effective distance. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, this attack will ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this attack cannot be reduced below {uip|MimimumDamage|3a4d9ccff9cf40bd88fa018e05ec550d}% for any reason.
